en: And to David We gave Solomon.
indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
[Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon
And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things]
over the remembrance of my Lord
until it [i.e., the sun] disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."
and set about striking [their] legs and necks.
and placed on his throne a body;
